thread.section_title: TicketCity Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TicketCity | www.ticketcity.com | 8 of 289
thread.title: Kelly Murray Jones
thread.title_full: TicketCity reviewed by Kelly Murray Jones

author: Kelly Murray Jones
title: Kelly Murray Jones
text:
Didn't appreciate the fact that we bought and paid for specific seats in specific spot. When tickets arrived less than 36 hours of the concert they were NOT the seats/section we had chose and paid for nor were tickets delivered when they were originally posted for delivery!
I find that very unsatisfactory!! will never use Ticket City again. We have always used Razorgator and Stub hub for concert and NFL tickets and have never had these issues.. So much for their guarantee!!!!
